title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 40.3 - Date for filing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 40.3 - Date for filing

State Regulations
(a) Applications
for the renewal of licenses must be filed within the period prescribed by the

Liquor Authority, as set forth in the instructions accompanying the renewal
advisory mailed to licensees. (b) No application for the renewal of a license will be accepted more than 30 days
after the expiration of the preceding license period, except for good cause
shown. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
40.3

Amended

New

York State Register January 13, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 02, eff. 1/13/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
